name: Mari / マリー / 마리 / 玛丽 (Blue Archive)
description:
Iochi Mari (Blue Archive)

伊落マリー (ブルーアーカイブ) / 이오치 마리 (블루 아카이브) / 伊落玛丽 (碧蓝档案)

Usage

Use any or all of the following tags to summon Mari: mari, halo, 1girl, blue eyes, orange hair, hair ornament

- It is recommended to add cat ears or animal ear headwear, otherwise her ears may not appear consistently.

- If Mari's ears are appearing through her veil, try adding animal ear fluff to the negative prompt.

- Hair and eye tags are optional.


For her normal outfit: single braid, animal ear headwear, nun, habit, blue neckerchief, white sailor collar, puffy long sleeves

For her sportswear alt: low ponytail, gym uniform, gym shirt, ponytail, white headband, id card, bottle

- Add track jacket, sportswear for her jacket.  Use open jacket, off shoulder instead when the jacket should be open.

- Use wet, wet clothes for transparent/wet clothing

For her swimsuit: black one-piece swimsuit, frilled swimsuit, frills, paw print

- You will likely need to add competition swimsuit to the negative prompt.

Weight 1 works best with most models. You may need to adjust weight when combining with other LoRAs.

Refer to https://huggingface.co/khanon/lora-training for other Blue Archive characters, training parameters, and datasets.

modelVersions.name: v5b
modelVersions.description:
Re-trained to correct issue where caption files were not being loaded correctly.  Compared to v4, this version should have more flexibility but requires additional outfit prompting.

Older version is available here.

meta.prompt:
masterpiece, perfect face, (thick lines:1.0), (ultra-detailed:1.2), (oil painting:0.9), (extremely detailed CG unity 8k wallpaper:1.2), soft lighting, mari, 1girl, halo, blue eyes, orange hair, single braid
animal ear headwear, nun, habit, blue neckerchief, white sailor collar, puffy long sleeves
upper body
BREAK standing, praying, own hands together, light smile, looking at viewer
church, indoors, sunlight, stained glass
<lora:chara-mari-v5b:1>
